title: "Can AI Computers Write Essays Better Than You?"
excerpt: "It's possible for AI engines to generate content without plagiarism, and it can be hard for you to tell the difference. If you can \"Google the answer,\" then an artificial intelligence can easily research facts and summarize them in an essay or research paper."
